mapper.select: SELECT * FROM menu n JOIN product p ON n.mucode = p.mucode1 OR n.mucode = p.mucode2 OR n.mucode = p.mucode3 WHERE n.mucode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mubcode},'%') ORDER BY mucode asc, pdseq asc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM menu n JOIN product p ON n.mucode = p.mucode1 OR n.mucode = p.mucode2 OR n.mucode = p.mucode3 WHERE n.mucode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mubcode},'%') ORDER BY mucode asc, pdseq asc

SELECT * FROM menu n JOIN product p ON n.mucode = p.mucode1 OR n.mucode = p.mucode2 OR n.mucode = p.mucode3
ORDER BY frcode ASC, pdseq ASC
select pdseq, frcode, bname, mname, pdname, price, pduploadfile, pdurl, hashtag, mucode1, mucode2, mucode3 from product where pdseq=#{pdseq}
mapper.insert: insert into product (pdseq, frcode, pdname, price, mucode1, mucode2, mucode3, hashtag, pduploadfile) values ((select nvl(max(pdseq), 0)+1 from product),${frcode},#{pdname},#{price},#{mucode1},#{mucode2},#{mucode3},#{hashtag},#{pduploadfile})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product WHERE hashtag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT count(*) FROM product WHERE hashtag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product p JOIN menu m ON p.mucode1=m.mucode OR p.mucode2=m.mucode OR p.mucode3=m.mucode WHERE m.muname=#{muname} ORDER BY p.pdseq

JOIN franchise f ON p.frcode=f.frcode WHERE p.pdname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') ORDER BY p.pdseq
